about_the_game:
An easy to use tool which uses free, open art, allowing you to easily make thousands of unique character sprite sheets for your game or project. Based on the Universal LPC Sprite Sheet project which is a free, open source project aimed at providing free character art for 2D games.

Made for instant import into the RPGMaker MV engine. All output files are simply PNG spritesheets, so if you are making your game in another engine you should be able to figure out how to use them in your engine with a small amount of effort.

content_descriptors.notes: The default character sheet starts out with no clothes on.  Not exactly "nudity" (i.e. there are no private parts depicted), but technically they are starter sprites without any cloth assets overlaid on them.
